chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
orig_base_params: BaseParams
one_node_params: OneNodeParams orig_base_params
raft_params: RaftParams orig_base_params
rri: raft_refinement_interface
cti: cronies_term_interface
tsi: term_sanity_interface
vci: votes_correct_interface
cci: cronies_correct_interface

Goal:
forall (net : network) (h : Net.name) (d : data) (gd : GhostSimulations.ghost_data) (e : entry), nwState net h = (gd, d) -> candidateEntries e (nwState net) -> candidateEntries e (update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h (gd, reboot d))

Premises:
name = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fin N : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, RaftParams orig_base_params -> Type Arguments name {orig_base_params raft_params}
Module Net := Struct Record BaseParams : Type := Build_BaseParams { data : Type; input : Type; output : Type } Definition data : BaseParams -> Type. Definition input : BaseParams -> Type. Definition output : BaseParams -> Type. Record OneNodeParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_OneNodeParams { init : data; handler : input -> data -> output * data } Definition init : forall P : BaseParams, OneNodeParams P -> data. Definition handler : forall P : BaseParams, OneNodeParams P -> input -> data -> output * data. Record SingleParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_SingleParams { init_handler : data; input_handler : input -> data -> list output * data
nwState = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) (n : network) => let (_, nwState) := n in nwState : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), network -> Net.name -> data Arguments nwState {P params}
Record network (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) : Type := mkNetwork { nwPackets : list packet; nwState : Net.name -> data } Arguments network {P params} Arguments mkNetwork {P params} _%list_scope _%function_scope
reboot = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (state : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) => mkRaft_data (currentTerm state) (votedFor state) (leaderId state) (log state) (commitIndex state) (lastApplied state) (stateMachine state) [] [] false [] Follower (clientCache state) (electoralVictories state) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output -> raft_data Arguments reboot {orig_base_params raft_params}
Module GhostSimulations := Struct Record GhostMultiParams (P0 : BaseParams) (P : MultiParams P0) : Type := Build_GhostMultiParams { ghost_data : Type; ghost_init : ghost_data; ghost_net_handlers : Net.name -> Net.name -> Net.msg -> ghost_data * data -> ghost_data; ghost_input_handlers : Net.name -> input -> ghost_data * data -> ghost_data } Definition ghost_data : forall (P0 : BaseParams) (P : MultiParams P0), GhostMultiParams P -> Type. Definition ghost_init : forall (P0 : BaseParams) (P : MultiParams P0) (GhostMultiParams : GhostMultiParams P), ghost_data. Definition ghost_net_handlers : forall (P0 :
data = fun BaseParams0 : BaseParams => let (data, _, _) := BaseParams0 in data : BaseParams -> Type Arguments data {BaseParams}
GhostSimulations.ghost_data = fun (P0 : BaseParams) (P : MultiParams P0) (GhostMultiParams : GhostSimulations.GhostMultiParams P) => let (ghost_data, _, _, _) := GhostMultiParams in ghost_data : forall (P0 : BaseParams) (P : MultiParams P0), GhostSimulations.GhostMultiParams P -> Type Arguments GhostSimulations.ghost_data {P0 P GhostMultiParams}
name_eq_dec : forall x y : name, {x = y} + {x <> y}
Record entry (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Type := mkEntry { eAt : name; eClient : clientId; eId : nat; eIndex : logIndex; eTerm : term; eInput : input } Arguments entry {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments mkEntry {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _ _%nat_scope
Record RaftParams (orig_base_params : BaseParams) : Type := Build_RaftParams { N : nat; input_eq_dec : forall x y : input, {x = y} + {x <> y}; output_eq_dec : forall x y : output, {x = y} + {x <> y}; clientId : Type; clientId_eq_dec : forall x y : clientId, {x = y} + {x <> y} } Arguments Build_RaftParams _ _%nat_scope (_ _)%function_scope [clientId]%type_scope _%function_scope
candidateEntries = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (e : entry) (sigma : name -> electionsData * RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) => exists h : name, wonElection (dedup name_eq_dec (cronies (fst (sigma h)) (eTerm e))) = true /\ (currentTerm (snd (sigma h)) = eTerm e -> type (snd (sigma h)) <> Candidate) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), entry -> (name -> electionsData * RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId
Record OneNodeParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_OneNodeParams { init : data; handler : input -> data -> output * data } Arguments Build_OneNodeParams _ _ _%function_scope
update : (forall x y : ?A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> (?A -> ?B) -> ?A -> ?B -> ?A -> ?B where ?A : [orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params rri : raft_refinement_interface cti : cronies_term_interface tsi : term_sanity_interface vci : votes_correct_interface cci : cronies_correct_interface |- Type] ?B : [orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params rri : raft_refinement_interface cti : cronies_term_interface tsi :
doLeader_preserves_candidateEntries : forall (net : network) (gd : GhostSimulations.ghost_data) (d : data) (h : Net.name) (os : list raft_output) (d' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)) (e : entry), nwState net h = (gd, d) -> doLeader d h = (os, d', ms) -> candidateEntries e (nwState net) -> candidateEntries e (update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h (gd, d'))
doGenericServer_preserves_candidateEntries : forall (net : network) (gd : GhostSimulations.ghost_data) (d : data) (h : Net.name) (os : list raft_output) (d' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)) (e : entry), nwState net h = (gd, d) -> doGenericServer h d = (os, d', ms) -> candidateEntries e (nwState net) -> candidateEntries e (update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h (gd, d'))
handleRequestVoteReply_preserves_candidate_entries : forall (net : network) (h h' : name) (t : nat) (r : bool) (st' : raft_data) (e : entry), st' = handleRequestVoteReply h (snd (nwState net h)) h' t r -> refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> candidateEntries e (nwState net) -> candidateEntries e (update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h (update_elections_data_requestVoteReply h h' t r (nwState net h), st'))
handleRV_advanceCurrentTerm_preserves_candidateEntries : forall (net : network) (h h' : name) (t lli llt : nat) (e : entry), candidateEntries e (nwState net) -> candidateEntries e (update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h (update_elections_data_requestVote h h' t h' lli llt (nwState net h), advanceCurrentTerm (snd (nwState net h)) t))
handleTimeout_preserves_candidateEntries : forall (net : network) (h : name) (e : entry) (out : list raft_output) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)), refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> handleTimeout h (snd (nwState net h)) = (out, d, l) -> candidateEntries e (nwState net) -> candidateEntries e (update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h (update_elections_data_timeout h (nwState net h), d))
handleAppendEntriesReply_preserves_candidate_entries : forall (net : network) (h h' : name) (t : nat) (es : list entry) (r : bool) (st' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)) (e : entry), handleAppendEntriesReply h (snd (nwState net h)) h' t es r = (st', ms) -> refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> candidateEntries e (nwState net) -> candidateEntries e (update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h (fst (nwState net h), st'))
handleAppendEntries_preserves_candidate_entries : forall (net : network) (h : name) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (d : raft_data) (m : msg) (e : entry), handleAppendEntries h (snd (nwState net h)) t n pli plt es ci = (d, m) -> refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> candidateEntries e (nwState net) -> candidateEntries e (update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h (update_elections_data_appendEntries h (nwState net h) t n pli plt es ci, d))
handleRequestVote_preserves_candidateEntries : forall (net : network) (h : name) (h' : fin N) (t lli llt : nat) (d : raft_data) (e : entry) (m : msg), handleRequestVote h (snd (nwState net h)) t h' lli llt = (d, m) -> candidateEntries e (nwState net) -> candidateEntries e (update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h (update_elections_data_requestVote h h' t h' lli llt (nwState net h), d))
refined_raft_net_invariant_reboot = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (net net' : network) (gd : GhostSimulations.ghost_data) (d : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (h : Net.name) (d' : raft_data), reboot d = d' -> P net -> refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> nwState net h = (gd, d) ->...-> Prop Arguments refined_raft_net_invariant_reboot {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
refined_raft_net_invariant_reboot' = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (net net' : network) (gd : GhostSimulations.ghost_data) (d : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (h : Net.name) (d' : raft_data), reboot d = d' -> P net -> refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net' -> nwState net h = (gd, d) ->...-> Prop Arguments refined_raft_net_invariant_reboot' {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
wonElection_candidateEntries_rvr : forall (net : network) (p : packet) (e : entry), votes_correct net -> cronies_correct net -> candidateEntries e (nwState net) -> In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = RequestVoteReply (eTerm e) true -> currentTerm (snd (nwState net (pDst p))) = eTerm e -> wonElection (dedup name_eq_dec (pSrc p :: votesReceived (snd (nwState net (pDst p))))) = true -> type (snd (nwState net (pDst p))) <> Candidate
candidateEntries_wonElection : forall (net : network) (e : entry) (h : Net.name), one_vote_per_term net -> cronies_votes net -> votes_received_cronies net -> candidateEntries e (nwState net) -> currentTerm (snd (nwState net h)) = eTerm e -> wonElection (dedup name_eq_dec (votesReceived (snd (nwState net h)))) = true -> type (snd (nwState net h)) <> Candidate
RRIR_doGenericServer : forall (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (os : list raft_output) (gd : GhostSimulations.ghost_data) (d d' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)) (h : name), refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> doGenericServer h d = (os, d', ms) -> nwState net h = (gd, d) -> (forall h' : name, st' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h (gd, d') h') -> (forall p : packet, In p ps' -> In p (nwPackets net) \/ In p (send_packets h ms)) -> refined_raft_intermediate_reachable {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |}
RRIR_doLeader : forall (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (h : name) (os : list raft_output) (gd : GhostSimulations.ghost_data) (d d' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)), refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> doLeader d h = (os, d', ms) -> nwState net h = (gd, d) -> (forall h' : name, st' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h (gd, d') h') -> (forall p : packet, In p ps' -> In p (nwPackets net) \/ In p (send_packets h ms)) -> refined_raft_intermediate_reachable {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |}
refined_raft_intermediate_reachable_ind : forall P : network -> Prop, P step_async_init -> (forall (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (failed' : list Net.name) (net' : network) (out : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P net -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed', net') out -> P net') ->...-> P n
refined_raft_intermediate_reachable_sind : forall P : network -> SProp, P step_async_init -> (forall (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (failed' : list Net.name) (net' : network) (out : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P net -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed', net') out -> P net') ->...-> P n
refined_raft_net_invariant_do_leader = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (gd : GhostSimulations.ghost_data) (d : raft_data) (h : name) (os : list raft_output) (d' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)), doLeader d h = (os, d', ms) -> P net -> refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> nwState net h = (gd, d) ->...-> Prop Arguments refined_raft_net_invariant_do_leader {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
refined_raft_net_invariant_do_generic_server = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (gd : GhostSimulations.ghost_data) (d : raft_data) (os : list raft_output) (d' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)) (h : name), doGenericServer h d = (os, d', ms) -> P net -> refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> nwState net h = (gd, d) ->...-> Prop Arguments refined_raft_net_invariant_do_generic_server {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
refined_raft_net_invariant_do_generic_server' = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (net : network) (st' : Net.name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (gd : GhostSimulations.ghost_data) (d : raft_data) (os : list raft_output) (d' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)) (h : name), doGenericServer h d = (os, d', ms) -> P net -> refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net ->...-> Prop Arguments refined_raft_net_invariant_do_generic_server' {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
refined_raft_net_invariant_do_leader' = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (net : network) (st' : Net.name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (gd : GhostSimulations.ghost_data) (d : raft_data) (h : name) (os : list raft_output) (d' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)), doLeader d h = (os, d', ms) -> P net -> refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net ->...-> Prop Arguments refined_raft_net_invariant_do_leader' {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
Inductive refined_raft_intermediate_reachable (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : network -> Prop := RRIR_init : refined_raft_intermediate_reachable step_async_init | RRIR_step_failure : forall (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (failed' : list Net.name) (net' : network) (out : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed', net') out -> refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net' | RRIR_handleInput : forall (net : network) (h : name) (inp : raft_input) (gd : electionsData) (out : list raft_output) (d : raft...
candidateEntries_same : forall (st st' : name -> electionsData * RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (e : entry), candidateEntries e st -> (forall h : name, cronies (fst (st' h)) = cronies (fst (st h))) -> (forall h : name, currentTerm (snd (st' h)) = currentTerm (snd (st h))) -> (forall h : name, type (snd (st' h)) = type (snd (st h))) -> candidateEntries e st'
refined_raft_net_invariant_timeout = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (net : network) (h : name) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (gd : electionsData) (out : list raft_output) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)), handleTimeout h (snd (nwState net h)) = (out, d, l) -> gd = update_elections_data_timeout h (nwState net h) -> P net -> refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net ->...-> Prop Arguments refined_raft_net_invariant_timeout {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
candidateEntries_ext : forall (e : entry) (sigma sigma' : name -> electionsData * RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output), (forall h : name, sigma' h = sigma h) -> candidateEntries e sigma -> candidateEntries e sigma'
refined_raft_net_invariant_timeout' = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (net : network) (h : name) (st' : Net.name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (gd : electionsData) (out : list raft_output) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)), handleTimeout h (snd (nwState net h)) = (out, d, l) -> gd = update_elections_data_timeout h (nwState net h) -> P net -> refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net ->...-> Prop Arguments refined_raft_net_invariant_timeout' {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
RRIR_handleInput : forall (net : network) (h : name) (inp : raft_input) (gd : electionsData) (out : list raft_output) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)) (ps' : list packet) (st' : name -> data), refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> handleInput h inp (snd (nwState net h)) = (out, d, l) -> update_elections_data_input h inp (nwState net h) = gd -> (forall h' : name, st' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h (gd, d) h') ->...-> refined_raft_intermediate_reachable {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |}
refined_raft_net_invariant_client_request = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (h : name) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (gd : electionsData) (out : list raft_output) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (c : input), handleClientRequest h (snd (nwState net h)) client id c = (out, d, l) ->...-> Prop Arguments refined_raft_net_invariant_client_request {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
candidateEntries_nw_invariant = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (p : packet) (t : term) (leaderId : name) (prevLogIndex : logIndex) (prevLogTerm : term) (entries : list entry) (leaderCommit : logIndex), In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t leaderId prevLogIndex prevLogTerm entries leaderCommit -> forall e : entry, In e entries ->...-> Prop Arguments candidateEntries_nw_invariant {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
refined_raft_net_invariant_client_request' = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (h : name) (net : network) (st' : Net.name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (gd : electionsData) (out : list raft_output) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (c : input), handleClientRequest h (snd (nwState net h)) client id c = (out, d, l) ->...-> Prop Arguments refined_raft_net_invariant_client_request' {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
raft_net_invariant_reboot = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (net net' : network) (d : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (h : Net.name) (d' : raft_data), reboot d = d' -> P net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net -> nwState net h = d -> (forall h' : Net.name, nwState net' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h d' h') -> nwPackets net = nwPackets net' ->...-> Prop Arguments raft_net_invariant_reboot {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
